Questions of Law for the Opinion of the Court of Appeal
[7] Being dissatisfied with the said determination of the Board of Review,
the Appellant appealed to the Court of Appeal and formulated the following
questions of law in the Case Stated for the opinion of the Court of Appeal:
(1)  Are the supplies made by Lanka Marine Services (Pvt) Ltd to foreign
ships capable of being lawfully classified as exports?
(2)  Is  Lanka  Marine  Services  (Pvt)  Ltd  entitled  to  enjoy  the  benefits
conferred by section 47 and section 15 (j) of the Inland Revenue Act,
No. 38 of 2000 as amended?
